PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ThermalLoadDesignCriteria
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Building thermal load design data that are used for calculating thermal loads in a space or building. HISTORY: New property set in IFC Release 1.0 (Pset_LoadDesignCriteria); renamed Pset_ThermalLoadDesignCriteria in IFC2x2.

PropertyDef.Name: OccupancyDiversity
PropertyDef.Definition: Diversity factor that may be applied to the number of people in the space.

PropertyDef.Name: OutsideAirPerPerson
PropertyDef.Definition: Design quantity of outside air to be provided per person in the space.

PropertyDef.Name: ReceptacleLoadIntensity
PropertyDef.Definition: Average power use intensity of appliances and other non-HVAC equipment.in the space per unit area.(PowerMeasure/IfcAreaMeasure)

PropertyDef.Name: AppliancePercentLoadToRadiant
PropertyDef.Definition: Percent of sensible load to radiant heat.

PropertyDef.Name: LightingLoadIntensity
PropertyDef.Definition: Average lighting load intensity in the space per unit area (PowerMeasure/IfcAreaMeasure)

PropertyDef.Name: LightingPercentLoadToReturnAir
PropertyDef.Definition: Percent of lighting load to the return air plenum.
